title: Ciai attiva supporto psicologico online per rifugiati ucraini (adulti e ragazzi) e chi li ospita
data:
{"address": {"address": {"address": {"city": "Milano", "country": "Italia", "country_code": "it", "county": "Milano", "postcode": "20142", "quarter": "Tibaldi", "road": "Via Bordighera", "state": "Lombardia", "suburb": "Chiesa Rossa"}, "boundingbox": ["45.43799", "45.4388822", "9.1736072", "9.1736512"], "class": "highway", "display_name": "Via Bordighera, Tibaldi, Chiesa Rossa, Milano, Lombardia, 20142, Italia", "importance": 0.41000000000000003, "lat": "45.4383509", "licence": "Data © OpenStreetMap contributors, ODbL 1.0. https://osm.org/copyright", "lon": "9.173625", "osm_id": 128185642, "osm_type": "way", "place_id": 131641506, "type": "unclassified"}, "mode": "autocomplete"}, "description": "Ciai - Centro italiano aiuti all’infanzia ha attivato un servizio di supporto psicologico online gratuito per:
➡️famiglie, adulti, ragazzi ucraini che vivono in Italia o sono appena arrivati
➡️persone che ospitano rifugiati
➡️associazioni

Il servizio è attivo su tutto il territorio nazionale. Per richiederlo:
Tel. 02 8484 4448 (orario di ufficio).

title: Ukranian sign language services to support deaf refugees
data: {"address": {"address": {"address": {"city": "Reggio nell'Emilia", "country": "Italia", "country_code": "it", "county": "Reggio nell'Emilia", "state": "Emilia-Romagna"}, "boundingbox": ["44.6244638", "44.7744479", "10.4910178", "10.7733414"], "class": "boundary", "display_name": "Reggio nell'Emilia, Emilia-Romagna, Italia", "icon": "https://nominatim.openstreetmap.org/ui/mapicons//poi_boundary_administrative.p.20.png", "importance": 0.6725411725065691, "lat": "44.6978389", "licence": "Data \u00a9 OpenStreetMap contributors, ODbL 1.0. https://osm.org/copyright", "lon": "10.6304971", "osm_id": 43415, "osm_type": "relation", "place_id": 284543523, "type": "administrative"}, "mode": "autocomplete"}, "description": "has set up a network of regional community/communication services to support Ukraine deaf refugees arriving in the Emilia Romagna region. These services aim to facilitate communication with local public bodies and public services thanks to deaf interpreters and mediators who know Ukrainian Sign Language.   Further info at emiliaromagna@ens.it  They released this signed video here attached: [https://youtube.com/watch?v=604vD8haZh8&feature=share](https://youtube.com/watch?v=604vD8haZh8&feature=share&fbclid=IwAR1_Pd9g8BXcSeZXSCrEU_1FrCxlhXs01r6TgXeNOo6NVzNfrFOm_LqBkos) EUD - The European Union of the Deaf  Christian Rathmann Debra Russell Arunas Brazas NRW: Deaf Refugees World Federation of the Deaf Ry Lorraine Leeson Anna Komarova Igor Chavrot", "iConfirmToHaveReadAndAcceptedInformativeToThreatPersonalData": true, "label": "services", "offerFromWho": ". The Emilia-Romagna Regional Branch of the Italian Deaf Association  (ENS)", "recipients": "Deaf", "submit": true, "title": "LIS Service to support deaf refugees", "type": "disabilityServices", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/groups/ukraineinfo.help/permalink/451623253373295/"}
body:
type: disabilityServices
offerFromWho: . The Emilia-Romagna Regional Branch of the Italian Deaf Association  (ENS)
title: LIS Service to support deaf refugees
recipients: Deaf
description: 'has set up a network of regional community/communication services to
  support Ukraine deaf refugees arriving in the Emilia Romagna region. These services
  aim to facilitate communication with local public bodies and public services thanks
  to deaf interpreters and mediators who know Ukrainian Sign Language.   Further info
  at emiliaromagna@ens.it  They released this signed video here attached: [https://youtube.com/watch?v=604vD8haZh8&feature=share](https://youtube.com/watch?v=604vD8haZh8&feature=share&fbclid=IwAR1_Pd9g8BXcSeZXSCrEU_1FrCxlhXs01r6TgXeNOo6NVzNfrFOm_LqBkos)
  EUD - The European Union of the Deaf  Christian Rathmann Debra Russell Arunas Brazas
  NRW: Deaf Refugees World Federation of the Deaf Ry Lorraine Leeson Anna Komarova
  Igor Chavrot'
url: https://www.facebook.com/groups/ukraineinfo.help/permalink/451623253373295/
